MetaNoRobots.help: When enabled, prevents search engines to index this page

MetaDescription.help: Helps search engines to index content of this page

OpenGraphDescription.help: Description text shown when page is shared on social networks

SiteName.caption: Site name
SiteName.help: Name of the site shown in browser title and other places

Exclude.help: When enabled, excludes page from showing in sitemap

Priority.caption: Priority
Priority.help: Priority of page for search engines
